docs.text: Magic The Gathering Ontology An ontology describing Magic: The Gathering. It provides the basic features needed to describe cards. URI: https://w3id.org/cmdoret/mtg-ontology/ Name: mtgo Classes Class Description Ability A card ability, activated, triggered or static ActivatedAbility A card ability which can be activated for a cost Artifact A permanent representing a magical item, animated construct, or other objects... Card A card in the Magic The Gathering game CardCollection A collection of Cards, such as a Deck or cards set Condition A condition expressed as a constraint on a property Cost The cost of a card or ability Creature A card that represents a creature that can be summoned to the battlefield Enchantment A permanent which applies persistent magical effects Event A combination of circumstances during a game Instant A card that represents an instant spell that can be cast KeywordAbility A passive ability represented by word that substitutes for a piece of rules t... Land A card that represents a land that can be tapped for mana LifeCost The life cost of a card or ability ManaCost The mana cost of a card or ability NamedThing A generic grouping for any identifiable entity Permanent A card or token that can be put onto the battlefield Property A property of an entity Sorcery A card that represents a sorcery spell that can be cast Spell An object on the stack StaticAbility A card ability which remains active until endgame once put into effect Token A permanent that is not represented by a regular card and does not have a cas... TriggeredAbility A card ability, triggered by an event Slots Slot Description ability An ability associated with a card action An action taken by a player or card additional_cost An additional cost to play a card or ability artist The artist who drew a card's illustration card_set A pool of cards released together and designed for the same play environment card_subtype The subtype(s) of a card, such as Equipment, Cat or Warrior card_supertype The supertype(s) of a card, such as Basic, Legendary or Snow card_type The text line below a card's illustration containing the card's type, subtype... color The color of a card condition A condition required for an activation converted_mana_cost The total mana cost for a card or ability, summed across all colors description A human-readable description for a thing entries Members of the card collection flavor_text The lore text at the bottom of a card id A unique identifier for a thing mana_cost A mana cost for a card or ability name A human-readable name for a thing power The amount of damage dealt in combat property A property of an entity rarity An ability associated with a card rules_text The text describing what an ability does source The entity responsible for an action target The entity targeted by an action or constraint toughness The amount of damage needed to destroy a creature type_line The text line below a card's illustration containing the card's type, subtype... value The numeric part of a quantitative value value_constraint A constraint on the value of a property Enumerations Enumeration Description Action An action taken by a player or card ActionConstraint Color A color, such as Black, Blue, Red, Green, White or Colorless Player One or more human players Rarity The rarity of the card, may be one of Common, Uncommon, Rare or Mythic ValueConstraint Types Type Description xsd:boolean A binary (true or false) value xsd:string a compact URI xsd:date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar linkml:DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime xsd:dateTime The combination of a date and time xsd:decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... xsd:double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification xsd:float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification xsd:integer An integer xsd:string Prefix part of CURIE shex:nonLiteral A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model shex:iri A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model xsd:string A character string xsd:dateTime A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... xsd:anyURI a complete URI xsd:anyURI a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description
